alert.note: Alert for Marshall (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:31AM EDT until June 14 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Monroe County in east central Ohio... Southwestern Belmont County in east central Ohio... Noble County in east central Ohio... Marshall County in northern West Virginia... * Until 515 AM EDT. * At 430 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Woodsfield to 7 miles northeast of Beverly, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Martinsville, Woodsfield, Caldwell, Dudley, Quaker City, Sardis, Beallsville, Clarington, Summerfield, Belle Valley, Lewisville, and Sarahsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
